generated.css: @import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@100;300;400;500;600;700;800&display=swap");html{--dark-background:#141828;--border:rgba(225,229,234,0.1);--dark-text-100:#fff;--dark-text-60:hsla(0,0%,100%,0.6);--dark-text-30:hsla(0,0%,100%,0.3);--red:#d94040;--blue:#5c7df9;--powered:#d0d6e3;--mobula:#808a9d;--green:#16c784;--fiat:#58667e}.App{text-align:center}.App-logo{height:40vmin;pointer-events:none}@media (prefers-reduced-motion:no-preference){.App-logo{animation:App-logo-spin 20s linear infinite}}.App-header{background-color:#282c34;min-height:100vh;display:flex;flex-direction:column;align-items:center;justify-content:center;font-size:calc(10px + 2vmin);color:#fff}.App-link{color:#61dafb}@keyframes App-logo-spin{0%{transform:rotate(0deg)}to{transform:rotate(1turn)}}.container-block{font-family:Inter,sans-serif;display:flex;overflow-x:scroll;padding:10px 0}.mobula-text{color:var(--dark-text-100);font-size:12px}.box-price-block{margin-right:10px;border:2px solid var(--border);border-radius:10px;background:#141821;width:100%;justify-content:space-between;min-width:150px;max-width:150px;display:flex;align-items:start;padding:15px}.token-logo-block{height:32px;width:32px;border-radius:100%}.text-token-name-block{color:var(--dark-text-100);font-size:16px;font-weight:400;margin-bottom:1px}.text-price-name-block{color:var(--mobula);font-size:14px;font-weight:400;margin-bottom:8px}.percentage-box-block{font-size:12px;font-weight:400;width:50px;border-radius:6px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;padding:3px 4px}*{margin:0}.container{font-family:Inter,sans-serif;border-radius:8px;border:2px solid var(--border);background:var(--dark-background);width:100%;color:var(--dark-text-100)}.info-box{width:100%;border-bottom:2px solid var(--border);padding-top:20px;padding-bottom:20px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center}.logo{margin-right:15px;width:48px;height:48px;border-radius:100%}.token-name{font-size:18px;font-weight:400;line-height:25.2px;color:var(--blue);margin-bottom:0}.token-price{display:flex;align-items:end;margin-top:5px}.span-fiat{color:var(--dark-text-30);margin-right:5px;margin-left:5px}.span-percentage{color:var(--red)}.volume-box{width:30%}.rank-box{width:30%;display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:start;align-items:center}.market-box{width:40%;border-left:2px solid var(--border);border-right:2px solid var(--border)}.padding-box{padding:20px;white-space:nowrap}.row-flex{width:100%;display:flex}.column-flex{display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:start;align-items:start}.amount-size{font-size:12px!important;color:var(--dark-text-30)}.white-600{color:var(--dark-text-60);font-size:12px;font-weight:400;margin-bottom:6px!important}.amount{font-size:16px}.padding-powered{padding-top:6px;border-top:2px solid var(--border);padding-bottom:6px;align-items:center;display:flex;justify-content:center}.powered{color:var(--powered);font-size:12px;font-weight:400}.mobula-logo{width:18px;height:18px;margin-right:5px}.container-price-marquee{padding:15px 0;display:flex;background:#141828;align-items:center;font-family:Inter,sans-serif;border-top:1px solid var(--border);border-bottom:1px solid var(--border);border-left:1px solid var(--border);overflow-x:scroll}.powered-price-marquee{display:flex;align-items:center;padding-right:25px;padding-left:15px;white-space:nowrap;border-right:1px solid var(--border)}.powered-text-price-marquee{font-size:12px;font-weight:400;margin-bottom:5px;color:var(--dark-text-100)}.mobula-text-price-marquee{font-size:12px;font-weight:400;color:var(--mobula)}::-webkit-scrollbar{width:12px;height:4px}::-webkit-scrollbar-track{background:orange;display:none}::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb{background-color:hsla(0,0%,100%,.08);border-radius:10px}.token-text-price-marquee{font-size:14px;white-space:nowrap;font-weight:400;color:var(--dark-text-100)}.fiat-text-price-marquee{font-size:12px;color:var(--fiat);margin-top:4px;font-weight:400}.between-price-marquee{display:flex;border-right:1px solid var(--border);justify-content:space-between;align-items:center;width:auto}.left-price-marquee{display:flex;margin-right:20px;align-items:center;padding-left:15px}.right-price-marquee{display:flex;flex-direction:column;padding-right:25px;align-items:end;padding-left:15px}.price-token-price-marquee{display:flex;align-items:center;color:var(--red);margin-top:4px}.percentage-text-price-marquee{font-size:13px}.percentage-circle{height:6px;margin-top:2px;margin-right:5px;width:10px;background:var(--red);border-radius:4px}
